p: The concoction showed a significant membrane stabilizing activity, which indicates that it may be another mechanism that would contribute to the anti-inflammatory effects observed. At the onset of an inflammation, the cells undergo activation and release inflammatory mediators. Stabilization of cell and cell organelle membranes would prevent the release of inflammatory mediators. Membrane stabilization has been identified as a mechanism of anti-inflammatory activity of other medicinal plants such as Solanum aethiopicum and Basella alba [ 56, 57].
